Title: Manga Aesop Monogatari (TV)
Description: ['Aesop is a trouble-making young boy who finds himself in another world filled with creatures he never believed to exist, such as fairies and talking donkeys. He sets off to find a way back to the nomal world. On his jouney he befriends many classical creatures from well-known fables and encounters many trials, each teaching him a valuable lesson. ']
Related: ['Character: Maple Town Monogatari', 'Other: Maple Town no Shouboutai']
